channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Secret Treasures Of The Vatican
channel.desc: For the first time in history, the Holy See has graciously permitted a large selection of historic artifacts from the Papal Treasury to travel outside the frontiers of the Vatican City State. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Ho Lung welcomes Archbishop Nicola Girasoli, Papal Nuncio to the Caribbean Region to talk about the Missionaries of the Poor, their way of life and their service among the poor and needy in the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Mark Mary Cristina explore the Holy Family's life before Jesus embarked on his mission. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: EWTN foundress Mother Angelica takes a look at mercy, and where it comes from, where it fits into our lives, and what it means to all of us. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Sunday Vespers With Benediction
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they celebrate Vespers and Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. (35 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: To explain the importance of devotion to Mary, Fr. Groeschel uses the Scriptures to discuss the Annunciation, and our acceptance of Jesus as Divine and as the Messiah, and Mary as the Mother of God. (25 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Follow along as Father Mark and Brother John head to San Francisco to spread the pro-life message as they join in marching at the Walk for Life West Coast. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Icons
channel.desc: Today?s heartwarming episode features Brothers Kolbe, Michelangelo and Francisco, three friars on a mission. They find and deliver a much-needed wheelchair to a child whose family could never afford it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Force For Good
channel.desc: How entrepreneur Gellert Dornay grew his successful home loan company, Axia Homes; Catholic University?s Max Torres explains how to apply catholic social teaching to the business world; how to save money, and more. Hosted by Jay Richards. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Sr. Briege McKenna, OSC, talks about her ministry to priests and religious and also shares her view on the state of the priesthood and religious life over the last fifty years. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord follow the faith journey of St. Therese of Lisieux, covering everything from her childhood, to her call to religious life, and the way of "The Little Flower.". (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, shares how the gifts of the Holy Spirit aid personal sanctification and exist for everyone. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak Offers practical tips for nurturing the friendship in marriage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Dr. Ray interviews two men who are leaders in faith, family and business. Joe Hamrock and Jeff Schiefelbein share insights into navigating today?s complex and challenging world. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Letter And Spirit
channel.desc: Dr. Scott Hahn and Mike Aquilina look at the life of Moses and the priestly people of the Book of Exodus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains we are no different than the Prodigal Son's older brother if we show indifference to others. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: Former NFL Wide-Receiver Danny Abramowicz and team talk about countering lust with fidelity in this hard-hitting look at Catholic spirituality for men. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Light That Never Fades
channel.desc: A documentary that explores the Byzantine rite and worship in Eastern Churches that are in communion with Rome. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Was There, The Holy Mass
channel.desc: A reverent animated account of a young man's realization of the meaning of the Mass for him. (30 minutes).
